Class Game

java.lang.Object
model.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
Blackjack, Slotmachine
public abstract class Game extends Object
Abstract class representing a casino game. Provides a general structure for all games, including common attributes and behavior. Each concrete game (e.g., Blackjack, Slotmachine) will extend this class and implement its own logic.
Since:
2.0
Author:
Davitroon

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(double money, String type)
      Constructor for creating a new game with a specific type and starting money. The game is active by default.
      Parameters:
      money - Initial amount of money associated with the game.
      type - Type of the game (e.g., "Blackjack", "Slotmachine").
      Since:
      2.0

    • Game

      public Game(int id, double money, String type)
      Constructor for creating a game with a specific ID, type, and money. Useful for loading existing games from a database.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the game.
      money - Amount of money associated with the game.
      type - Type of the game.
      Since:
      2.0

    • Game

      public Game(int id, String type, boolean active, double money)
      Complete constructor for a game with all attributes specified.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the game.
      type - Type of the game.
      active - Whether the game is active or not.
      money - Amount of money associated with the game.
      Since:
      2.0

  • Method Details

    • getMoney

      public double getMoney()
      Gets the amount of money currently associated with the game.
      Returns:
      Current game money.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the unique identifier of the game.
      Returns:
      Game ID.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of the game.
      Returns:
      Game type (e.g., "Blackjack").

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if the game is currently active.
      Returns:
      true if active, false otherwise.

    • play

      public abstract double play(double bet)
      Abstract method to play the game. Each concrete game must implement this method to define its own rules for calculating winnings or losses based on the player's bet.
      Parameters:
      bet - Amount of the player's bet.
      Returns:
      Modified bet: positive for winnings, negative for losses, or same/zero for a push.
      Since:
      2.0

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets the active status of the game.
      Parameters:
      active - true to mark the game as active, false to mark it as inactive.

    • setMoney

      public void setMoney(double money)
      Sets the amount of money associated with the game.
      Parameters:
      money - New money amount.
